comment.author: 40216806@N00
comment._content: Boy, he looks like quite the party animal.

comment.author: 33593953@N02
comment._content: Richard Allen Norton: Thanks for pointing out Nickalls' connection to the Yale University crew. And thanks, Wystan, for highlighting the date on the negative. It appears, from an article in the New-York Tribune for June 14, 1914 that I found online through Chronicling America, that Yale was gearing up to face Harvard in June of that year: chroniclingamerica.loc.gov/lccn/sn83030214/1914-06-14/ed-... . We'll add information when we next update the description.
